ResourceType.description: The type of communication – Messages, Calls, Conferences, and Participants

Enabled.description: If true, Twilio will automatically generate every day's file when the day is over.

WebhookMethod.description: Sets whether Twilio should call a webhook URL when the automatic generation is complete, using GET or POST. The actual destination is set in the webhook_url

WebhookUrl.description: Stores the URL destination for the method specified in webhook_method.
